greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number triangle binomial(3n-k,n-k).
comment: g(x)=2*sin(arcsin(3*sqrt(3*x)/2)/3)/sqrt(3*x);g(x)=1/(1-xg(x)^2). First column is A005809. Second column is A025174. Row sums are A045721. Inverse is Riordan array (1-3x,x(1-x)^2), A119302.
formula: 'Horizontal' recurrence equation: T(n,0) = binomial(3*n,n) and for k >= 1, T(n,k) = sum {i = 1..n+1-k} i*T(n-1,k-2+i). - _Peter Bala_, Dec 28 2014
maple: for n from 0 to 9 do print(seq(T(n,k),k=0..n)) od; # _Peter Luschny_, Dec 30 2014
results.author: _Paul Barry_, May 13 2006
